abstract: Wal-Mart’s chief took the unusual step of releasing portions of a former employee’s sworn testimony that denied surveillance on shareholders and employees.
snippet: Wal-Mart’s chief took the unusual step of releasing portions of a former employee’s sworn testimony that denied surveillance on shareholders and employees.
lead_paragraph: A former Wal-Mart computer technician, who asserted that company employees eavesdropped on board meetings and conducted clandestine surveillance on shareholders, has reversed himself and denied both claims in sworn testimony, the giant retailer said yesterday.

headline.main: A New Twist on Snooping at Wal-Mart
headline.print_headline: A New Twist On Snooping At Wal-Mart

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Wiretapping and Other Eavesdropping Devices and Methods

abstract: Helen Robson Walton’s husband, Sam Walton, founded Wal-Mart Stores and relied on her for advice.
snippet: Helen Robson Walton’s husband, Sam Walton, founded Wal-Mart Stores and relied on her for advice.
lead_paragraph: Helen Robson Walton, whose husband, Sam Walton, founded Wal-Mart Stores and relied on her for advice, died on Thursday at her home in Bentonville, Ark. She was 87.

headline.main: Helen Walton, Matriarch of Wal-Mart Family, Dies at 87
headline.print_headline: Helen Walton, Matriarch of Wal-Mart Family, Dies at 87
